data.title: Amazon’s ‘record’ holiday sales helps Nasdaq blow past 9,000
data.text: Amazon’s “record-breaking” holiday season drove the stock up 4.5% on Thursday and helped lift the Nasdaq composite index above 9,000 for the first time ever.

data.title: 3 Stocks to Buy After Record Online Holiday Season Sales

data.title: Smart speakers were some of the holiday season’s top stocking stuffers in 2019
data.text: It looks like Santa was busy stuffing stockings with smart speakers and wearables this Christmas.

data.title: Microsoft’s Mixer grows audience, but Amazon’s Twitch continues to dominate streaming market
data.text: Users watched more than twice as many hours on Mixer in 2019 as they did the year before, but despite landing one of the biggest names in video games, Microsoft’s streaming platform wasn’t able to keep pace with Facebook Gaming, and it continues to be dwarfed by Amazon’s Twitch in overall market share.

data.title: Nasdaq Hits 9,000 As Amazon Rallies On 'Record-Breaking' Holiday Numbers
data.text: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) stock was trading higher Thursday after the company said it had a "record-breaking" holiday season with billions of items ordered.

data.title: Facebook, Amazon, Google and a big fear that transcends partisan politics and wealth
data.text: Trust in tech, from Facebook to Google and Amazon, has dropped this decade. But amid partisanship and wealth inequality, this issue does not divide Americans much.

data.title: Is North America Contribution To Amazon’s Total Revenue 60%, 70%, Or 80%?
data.text: Amazon‘s (NASDAQ: AMZN) North America business, consisting primarily of retail sales in the region, is expected to contribute $177.6 billion to Amazon’s 2019 revenues, making up 61.2% of Amazon’s $290.4 billion in expected revenues for 2019.

data.title: Amazon Claims Record Holiday Shopping Sales Period
data.text: Amazon says it had a record number of shoppers for the holidays, with the e-commerce giant claiming billions of items were ordered worldwide. A record number also tried out Amazon Prime.

data.title: Is Google Amazon's Biggest Competitor?
data.text: The Alphabet unit has quietly become the essential partner for any retailer that wants to make headway in e-commerce.

data.title: The Nominees For Best Retailers Of The Last Decade Are.
data.text: The best retailers of the decade are dominated by some familiar names like Amazon, Lidl, Aldi, Ikea, and up and comers D1 and Justo & Bueno from Colombia.

data.title: Amazon just had its best holiday season ever, boosted by Echos and Roombas
data.text: Amazon said this holiday season was another record-setter. The overall retail sector had a big year too, signaling that the decade-long economic expansion in the United States still has some legs left in it.

data.title: Amazon and its big retail rivals power record e-commerce holiday spending
data.text: Amazon is claiming record shopping levels this holiday season as the tech giant and its retail rivals brought e-commerce sales to new heights.

data.title: Amazon Closes the Book on a Disappointing 2019
data.text: Analysts remain very much in love with the company. It currently has 43 buy ratings, one overweight rating, two holds and no underweight or sells and a 12-month price target of $2,178, 22% higher than today.

data.title: Now Is The Right Time To Buy Amazon
data.text: Amazon stock has been consolidating in a sideways range for over 18 months.

data.title: Amazon says the last delivery before Christmas arrived at 11:59pm PT in Seattle
data.text: Amazon.com Inc.  said in its Thursday holiday round up that the last delivery the e-commerce giant made before Christmas was at 11:59pm PT in Seattle.

data.title: Amazon Limps Out of the Holiday Season
data.text: Spending rose 3.4% this holiday season, which is measured by retail sales starting November 1.
